title: Restaurant Hagedis
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Organic, Western, Beer/Wine, Dutch
description: Veggie restaurant set in an old school building. Food is made with mostly local, seasonal, and organic produce. Typically 2 weekly menus - one 'Hagedis' menu, and a more luxurious menu, in addition to a la carte. Child friendly. Could bring your own boxes or plates for a takeaway meal.
